description:
only figurative make oneself odious, become odious (compare English be in bad
        odour), followed by אֵת
with = towards; נִבְאַשְׁתָּ אֶתאָֿבִיךָ
2Sam 16:21
    
thou hast become odious with thy father; also followed by בְּ (rather
    strangely) 1Sam 13:4
    
Israel made themselves odious to the Philistines; 2Sam 10:6 Ammonites to David
